original_text: Then Samuel brought all the tribes of Israel near, and the tribe of Benjamin was taken by lot.
korean_text: 사무엘이 이에 이스라엘 모든 지파를 가까이 오게 하였더니 베냐민 지파가 뽑혔고

sentences.original_text: Then Samuel brought all the tribes of Israel near
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사무엘이 이스라엘 모든 지파를 가까이 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and the tribe of Benjamin was taken by lot
